text:
Carlo Sabatini (7 April 1932 – 10 April 2020) was an Italian actor. He was born in Rome. He was known for voice dubbing movie roles of Morgan Freeman and Sir Ian McKellen from English to Italian. He voiced dubbed Magneto in "X-Men", "X2", ', "The Wolverine", and '.
Sabatini died on 10 April 2020 in Rome, aged 88.
